metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins by brennacodes

plugins.name: i-did-a-thing
plugins.description: A build-me-up tool that helps you log professional experiences and build tailored resumes from your personal arsenal of evidence

plugins.name: what-did-you-do
plugins.description: Interview preparation with persona-driven practice, company-specific mocks, spaced repetition, and progress tracking — powered by your i-did-a-thing arsenal

plugins.name: mark-my-words
plugins.description: Write, manage, and publish blog posts on Quartz static sites — with rich media support for images, diagrams, and video embeds
